member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.Input.SfTextBoxExt
member.summary: Text box class

Represents a Windows 8 extended textbox. The TextBoxExt control allows the user to enter text in an application. This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows 8 text box control, including Watermark support and AutoComplete.
member.remarks: The TextBoxExt is inherited from TextBox.
